text: Deck Masters just finished our deck and I couldn’t be happier! The quality of work and the kindness of the staff goes way above and beyond. I did a lot of reading reviews on this company and I must say they were all excellent and I went back at least 6 years before I decided to go with them. It took awhile to get the project started but I’m glad we had the patience to wait. I would definitely use them again and I’m already recommending them to our friends. Thank you Jordan for the communication and Robert thank you for your hard work! Your group is awesome.
author: Lenora Baker
